titlestmt.titleproper: Milton E. Botwinik index to information requests in a Jewish Genealogical Society publication 1986
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Milton E. Botwinik index to information requests in a Jewish Genealogical Society publication
did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

bioghist.p: possibly the New York one (indexing done by someone from Teaneck, New Jersey), but could be Philadelphia

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of computer printouts related to advertisements placed in the Jewish Genealogical Society's newsletter(?), indexed by name or geographic location. The ad numbers are indicated, but there is no further information about the content of each ad. There is also a computer printout listing names in Soundex order.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
